articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Light Industrial Factories in Hamhung
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Light Industrial Factories in Hamhung
Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to light industrial factories in Hamhung.
					 The first leg of his guidance was the Paekunsan Combined Foodstuff Factory.
					
					 He was briefed on its history. Then he went round different production processes including noodle production process, confectionary production process and bread production process to learn in detail about the reconstruction and technological equipment of the factory and the production there.
					
					  After learning in detail about the production of varieties of special foodstuffs produced at the factory, he was very pleased that it became possible to supply greater quantities of tasty and nutritious foodstuffs to the people.
					
					 A torch lit by the WPK at the Samilpho Special Products Factory last year spread like a prairie fire to build combined foodstuff factories in various provinces one after another, he said, adding that this proves that when the officials work tenaciously despite difficulties and hardships with the spirit of devotedly serving the people, it is possible to bring greater happiness and comfort to the people even under the present conditions.
					
					 He put forward the tasks which would serve as guidelines for managing and operating the factory, expressing expectation and conviction that the employees of the factory would boost the production of foodstuffs to make a positive contribution to improving the people's diet with ardent love for them. 
					
					 The next leg of his guidance was the Hamhung Disabled Soldiers' Essential Plastic Goods Factory.
					
					 He looked round various production processes to see varieties of products made by the factory and acquaint himself in detail with production there. 
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that disabled soldiers and their families of the factory have produced a lot of goods of diverse varieties conducive to improving the standard of people's living in the same spirit and stamina as displayed in those days of soldiers on the frontline, true to the teaching of President Kim Il Sung that flowers should be kept in bloom. And he highly appreciated the laudable done by them.
					
					 The injection-molded crystal sandals, in particular, produced by the factory are beautiful in their shape and color and very comfortable for use, he said, adding that this is the precious fruition of the ardent love of the disabled soldiers for the people.
					
					 Noting that the disabled soldiers who unhesitatingly risked their youth and lives for the party and the leader, the motherland and the people should be accorded preferential treatment socially, he underscored the need for the party organizations at different levels to always pay deep attention to their work and life. 
					
					 He advanced important tasks which would serve as guidelines for managing and operating the factory. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il learned about the construction of the Hungnam Pharmaceutical Factory. 
					
					 After being briefed on the factory in front of its model board, he learned in detail about the progress made in the construction of the factory, varieties of medicines produced by it and their efficacy. 
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the workers of the factory have completed in the main the construction of production buildings and are waging a high-pitched drive to install modern pharmaceutical equipment. 
					
					 He highly appreciated the exploits performed by the workers of the factory, noting that it was a signal success that it trebled the production of medicines as compared with that in the past while dynamically pushing ahead with a huge construction project.  
					
					 He set forth tasks to be implemented to complete the construction of the factory ahead of schedule and boost the production of medicines. 
					
					 He expressed expectation and conviction that the officials, workers and technicians of the factory would wind up the construction of the factory ahead of schedule and bring about a leap forward and innovations in the production of medicines.
					
					 He was accompanied by Kwak Pom Gi, chief secretary of the South Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the WPK, Kim Ki Nam and Hong Sok Hyong, members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the C.C., the WPK, Kim Kyong Hui, member of the Political Bureau and department director of the C.C., the WPK, Jang Song Thaek, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-chairman of the NDC, Pak To Chun and Thae Jong Su, alternate members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Hamhung University of Hydraulic Engineering
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Hamhung University of Hydraulic Engineering
Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to Hamhung University of Hydraulic Engineering.
					 He looked round the room devoted to the history of the university, conducted by its leading officials.
					
					 He said that the university was established on the direct initiative of President Kim Il Sung and under his wise leadership and has covered the road of glory, turning into a reliable seat for training technical personnel, adding that the undying revolutionary exploits of the President would shine long in the history of the country.
					
					 Noting that the university has performed great feats in realizing the WPK's grandiose nature-remaking plan including the West Sea Barrage, the world's leading barrage, the Taedonggang Power Station and the Taegyedo Tideland Reclamation, he said that the party and people of the DPRK would always remember the feats performed by the teachers and students of the university for the party and the revolution, the country and the people.
					
					 He went round the Education and Science Exhibition of the university.
					
					 Going round the exhibits, he acquainted himself in detail with the successes achieved in the development of education and scientific researches and expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the teachers and students of the university have done a lot of work for the prosperity of the country.
					
					 He looked round various lecture rooms and a library and personally visited a classroom where a foreign language lecture was given to learn in detail about how the education was conducted.
					
					 He highly appreciated the successes made by the teaching staff of the university, very pleased with the new turn brought about by them in education and scientific researches.
					
					 He met the educators and researchers who made distinguished contributions to the education and scientific researches, working at the university for years, and gave a warm pep-talk to them.
					
					 He highly appreciated the feats made by teachers and researchers including academicians, professors and doctors before having a photo session with them.
					
					 He advanced important tasks facing the university.
					
					 He called upon the teachers of the university to steadily improve and strengthen the educational work as required by the developing reality and thus train more talented scientific and technical personnel, always bearing in mind the Party's intention to bring the nation's science and technology to the world's level in the shortest span of time. 
					
					 In order to train students to be competent scientists and technicians required by the IT age, the university should embody the party's spirit and the working-class spirit in education, firmly establish Juche in it, bring about steady innovations in its contents and quality and decisively improve and strengthen the education in science and technology, in particular.
					
					 He underscored the need to conduct brisk activities to introduce advanced technology in close touch with scientific research institutes and universities.
					
					 He expressed great expectation and conviction that all the teachers and students of the university would bring about a new turn in training scientific and technological personnel and developing science and technology.
					
					 He was accompanied by Kwak Pom Gi, chief secretary of the South Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the WPK, Kim Ki Nam and Hong Sok Hyong, members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the C.C., the WPK, Kim Kyong Hui, member of the Political Bureau and department director of the C.C., the WPK, Jang Song Thaek, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-chairman of the NDC, and Pak To Chun and Thae Jong Su, alternate members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Late Kim Su Jo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Late Kim Su Jo
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent a wreath to the bier of the late Kim Su Jo, winner of Kim Il Sung Prize, hero of the DPRK, People's Artiste, deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and director of the Phibada Opera Troupe, on Wednesday, expressing deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Equipment to Wonsan University of Agriculture
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Equipment to Wonsan University of Agriculture
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent a lot of modern equipment including refrigeration high-speed centrifugal separator, asepsis operation stand and revolving vaporizer to Wonsan University of Agriculture.
					 A ceremony for conveying the equipment took place on Wednesday.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greet UAE President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greet UAE President
Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a message of greetings to Sheikh Halifa Bin Zayed Al-Nahayan, President of the United Arab Emirates, on the occasion of its national day.
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and the United Arab Emirates would grow stronger in the future, wishing the friendly people of the UAE greater progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Lao President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Lao President
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a message of greetings to Choummaly Saynasone, president of Laos, on the occasion of the 35th anniversary of the founding of the Lao People's Democratic Republic.
					 Kim in the message said that the Lao government and people have achieved great successes in the defence of the country and economic construction under the correct leadership of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party.
					
					 The Korean people are sincerely rejoiced over them and wholeheartedly hope that the Lao people will register greater successes in their efforts to more significantly greet the 9th Congress of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party and realize the industrialization and modernization of the country as early as possible, the message noted.
					
					 The message expressed belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the Korean and Lao peoples formed on the road of anti-imperialism and socialism would steadily grow stronger in the future, too.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Romanian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Romanian President
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a message of greetings to Traian Basescu, President of Romania, on the occasion of its national day.
					 Kim in the message wished the President and the people of Romania success in their work for the economic stability and development of the country.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim Greets UAE PM
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim Greets UAE PM
Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- Premier Choe Yong Rim Wednesday sent a message of greetings to Sheikh Muhammad Bin Rashid Al-Maktoum, Vice-President and Prime Minister of the United Arab Emirates, on the occasion of its national day.
					The message sincerely wished the Vice-President and Prime Mminister and the government of the United Arab Emirates greater success in the work for the development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim Greets Lao PM
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim Greets Lao PM 
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- Premier Choe Yong Rim Wednesday sent a message of greetings to Bouasone Bouphavanh, Prime Minister of Laos, on the occasion of the 35th anniversary of the founding of the Lao People's Democratic Republic.
					 The message said that the Korean people are rejoiced over many successes made by the Lao government and people in the efforts to achieve socio-political stability and economic development of the country and improve the standard of people's living under the leadership of the party.
					
					 The message expressed belief that the bonds of traditional friendship and cooperation between the two countries would continue to grow stronger in the future, too, wishing him success in his responsible work.
					
					 Meanwhile, Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun sent a similar message to Thongloun Sisoulth, vice-prime minister and foreign minister of Laos.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim Greets Romanian PM
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim Greets Romanian PM
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- Premier Choe Yong Rim Wednesday sent a message of greetings to Emil Boc, prime minister of Romania, on the occasion of its national day. 
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would further develop as required by the new century.
					
					 Meanwhile, Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun sent a similar message to Theodore Baconschi, foreign minister of Romania, on the same occasion.

articles.title: Day of Cuban Revolutionary Armed Forces Observed
articles.content:
Day of Cuban Revolutionary Armed Forces Observed
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- Cuban Ambassador Jose Manuel Galego Montano and Military Attache Leonardo Perez Mesa of the Cuban embassy here gave a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Corps Club on Wednesday on the occasion of the 54th anniversary of the Cuban revolutionary armed forces. 
					 Present there on invitation were Pak Jae Gyong, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, general officers and other officers of the Korean People's Army, officials concerned, diplomatic envoys and military attaches of foreign embassies here.
					
					 Staff members of the Cuban embassy were present there. 
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: World AIDS Day Observed
articles.content:
World AIDS Day Observed
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- A function was held at the People's Palace of Culture Wednesday on the occasion of World AIDS Day.
					 Present there were officials of ministries, national institutions and working people's organizations, officials in the field of public health and representatives and members of missions of WHO and other international organizations here.
					
					 Speakers said that AIDS presents itself as a very serious problem worldwide, underscoring the importance of the project to prevent it.
					
					 They called for further intensifying the project for preventing and controlling AIDS in close touch with international organizations including the WHO and the UN AIDS Organization.
					
					 The participants watched a CD titled "Universal Access and Human Rights" on the theme subject chosen by the WHO this year and a performance given by a group for hygienic information service.

articles.title: DWUK Consumption Goods Exhibition Held
articles.content:
DWUK Consumption Goods Exhibition Held
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- A national exhibition of mass consumption goods produced by members of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea was held at the Three-Revolution Exhibition on Nov. 30 and Dec. 1.
					 On display at the exhibition were more than 15,700 pieces of sundry goods, grass work, handicrafts, etc. of 195 varieties produced by organizations and members of the women's union across the country.
					
					 The products made by use of raw materials found in abundance in local areas and materials lying unused attracted the attention of the participants for their attractive designs and diversity in their varieties and shapes.
					
					 The exhibition also offered the participants an opportunity to learn from the successes and experience gained in producing quality and useful mass consumption goods and generalize them.

articles.title: New Veterinary Medicines Developed
articles.content:
New Veterinary Medicines Developed
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- New efficacious veterinary medicines have been manufactured in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 One of them is vermicide for animals made by the Central Zoo with bithionol mixed with copper.
					
					 It is potent for Trematoda, tapeworms and eelworms.
					
					 The manufacturing method of the medicine reaching 95-100 percent in extermination rate was highly appreciated at the 11th National Exhibition of Inventions and New Technologies held some time ago.
					
					 The Epizootic Prevention Center of the Pyongyang Poultry Guidance Bureau has developed a bursa fabricius disease vaccine.
					
					 The epizootic disease suffered by chickens, 3-6 weeks old in general, is very high in death rate. 
					
					 The vaccine has proved high in immunogenicity.

articles.title: Korean Central History Museum Greets Its Birthday
articles.content:
Korean Central History Museum Greets Its Birthday
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- December 1 is the 65th anniversary of the Korean Central History Museum.
					The museum has served as one of the country's cultural asset storehouses and centre of education in history under the care of President Kim Il Sung, General Secretary Kim Jong Il and anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					
					 The researchers of the museum have enriched the storehouse of the nation's cultural heritages by discovering many historical relics associated with the spirit and talents of the Korean people and making a profound study of them in a scientific way. In this way they have contributed to formulating the 5 000-year-long history of the Korean nation.
					
					 The museum preserves cultural relics on the principle of retaining the advantages of the nation, while inspiring the visitors with the spirit of patriotism.
					
					 It showcases a large number of data and relics in nearly twenty rooms, divided into different periods.
					
					 The exhibits show the long history and brilliant culture of the Korean nation, as well as the course of social, economic and cultural development from the primitive ages to the modern ages. 
					
					 In particular, the remains from the ruined kiln in Wonsan-ri mirror the long history of world-famous Koryo celadon.
					
					 Several dozen horse models of different sizes, made of iron and bronze, are considered a national treasure providing a glimpse of the spirit of Koguryo, which was the strongest country in the east.
					
					 The Taeja Temple's bell, 83cm high and 55cm across, is believed to have been made in 1192. It comprises such typical features of the bells in the Koryo period as dragon-shaped hasp and lotus and vine patterns.
					
					According to Ri Han Ok, a section chief of the museum, it has been visited by some 9480,000 local people and 165,000 foreigners and overseas Koreans over the past 65 years.
					
					 The museum, honored with the Order of Kim Il Sung, is located in Central District, Pyongyang.

articles.title: KCNA Holds US Wholly Responsible for Nuclear Threat and Proliferation
articles.content:
KCNA Holds US Wholly Responsible for Nuclear Threat and Proliferation
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- Recently the Singaporean Straits Times issued an article confirming Israel's access to nukes, attracting the attention of the international community. 
					 According to it, in 1969 the then U.S. President Nixon at the talks with the then Israeli Prime Minister Golda Meir concluded a secret agreement to the effect that the U.S. would connive at Israel's nuclear capability and give up the pressure upon it to accede to the NPT on condition that Israel would make public its nuclear capability as it pleased. It was reported that the successive U.S. presidents including the present Obama administration have kept the agreement in top secrecy. Since then Israel has pursued a NCND policy regarding its access to nukes. 
					
					 This is clear evidence bringing to light Israel's nuclear development and the injustice of the double standard applied by the U.S. over the nuclear issue. 
					
					 Israel's possession of nukes has long been a major topic of discussion by the international community. 
					
					 From late in the 1940s Israel kicked off its nuclear program in secrecy and tried hard to acquire technology for the manufacture of nuclear weapons. During the Third Middle East War it possessed 15 nuclear warheads and in the1980s their number reached 200. It was reported to have stockpiled hundreds of tons of substance needed for the production of nukes. As a result, Israel has become the world's sixth largest possessor of nukes. 
					
					 It was none other than the U.S. which zealously helped Israel go nuclear both technically and materially and protected and connived at it. 
					
					 After deciding to give "aid" to Israel in its nuclear development, the U.S. sent nuclear-physicists to it. And the U.S. delivered highly enriched uranium to Israel, putting spurs to its nuclear development. 
					
					 The world is making uproar over Israel's access to nuclear weapons and nuclear proliferation but the U.S. has connived at it. The U.S. did the same when this year the British Guardian revealed the fact that in the 1970s the governments of Israel and South Africa held secret talks and a deal in nukes. 
					
					 Even the U.S. diplomatic chief said that the biggest concern in the world is terrorists' possible access to substance for the manufacture of nuclear bombs, adding that Israel is able to do a lot to prevent this. 
					
					 Encouraged by the U.S., Israel went the lengths of asserting that there is no reason for the international community to pressurize it over the nuclear issue. It grumbled that some countries are threatening Israel's existence. 
					
					 This goes to prove that the U.S. is the accomplice and helper of Israel in its nuclear weaponization. 
					
					 The U.S. is pulling up those countries which incur its displeasure over their nuclear activities for peaceful purposes and labeling them "nuclear criminals" while conniving, patronizing and cooperating with its "allies" and followers' nuclear weaponization. Typical examples of this are the U.S. attitude towards the DPRK and Iran. 
					
					 Needless to say, this stand and attitude of the U.S. are no more than a double standard, a serious breach of the principle of impartiality in the nuclear field. 
					
					 Meanwhile, the U.S. is giving spurs to the modernization of nukes. 
					
					 Recently the U.S. conducted a sub-critical nuclear test under the pretext of "ensuring the security of nuclear arsenal" and it is set to spend 4 billion U.S. dollars for the modernization of nuke facilities. 
					
					 The ulterior motive of the Obama administration professing "a world without nuclear weapons" was brought to light by its nuclear tests and scenario for the modernization of nuke production, a violation of its advocacy. 
					
					 The U.S. plan to build "a world without nuclear weapons" is nothing but a smokescreen to cover up its ambition for world domination based on nukes and deceive the world people. 
					
					 It is another hideous crime against humankind that the U.S., the world's biggest possessor of nukes and a nuclear war criminal, is persistently pursuing its nuclear scenario. 
					
					 No one is allowed to high-handedly and arbitrarily behave and has any right to apply a double standard in the nuclear field. 
					
					 The U.S. is wholly to blame for the nuclear threat and the danger of nuclear proliferation mounting worldwide.

articles.title: Lee Group Accused of His Reckless Remarks Escalating Confrontation
articles.content:
Lee Group Accused of His Reckless Remarks Escalating Confrontation
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors, after voting for a "resolution on the human rights issue in the north" which south Korea co-sponsored together with the U.S. at the U.N., did not bother to talk nonsense recently that it "supports the contents of the resolution" and "looks forward to a substantial improvement."
					 Minju Joson Wednesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 What the group of traitors uttered is reckless outbursts escalating the confrontation as they are a blatant challenge to the DPRK.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group's lobbying for the carriage of the above-said resolution is a product of the conspiratorial campaign desperately stepped up to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 What merits a serious attention is that the above-said role played by the group for the adoption of the resolution amounts to a blind submission and zealous pursuance of the U.S. "human rights" offensive against the DPRK.
					
					 As far as the above-said "human rights" offensive of the U.S. is concerned, it is aimed at imposing the American-style democracy and market economy upon the DPRK and put the DPRK which enjoys high dignity for its independence under its control just as it did south Korea by applying its "human rights standard." 
					
					 The Lee group is taking the lead in such vicious "human rights" offensive. It is preposterous for the group to act in concert with the U.S., the chief architect of the said "human rights" offensive.
					
					 This only betrays the ulterior intention of the group to tarnish the image of the people-centered socialist system of Korean style without parallel in the world and pursue confrontation with fellow countrymen, not reconciliation and unity with them.
					
					 The group would be well advised to face up to the reality and immediately halt its reckless moves to escalate the confrontation. If the group persists in its reckless anti-DPRK conspiratorial racket, not away from its stereotyped conception of confrontation, it will only suffer disgrace and ruin.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Moves to Stage Comeback to Korea Disclosed
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Moves to Stage Comeback to Korea Disclosed
Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- The Japanese government is mulling modifying the "Japan-U.S. defense cooperation guidelines" so as to dispatch the "Self-Defense Forces" to battle fields in "contingency" on the Korean Peninsula while vociferating about "tightened alliance" with the U.S.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 This indicates that the Japanese reactionaries' scenario to stage a comeback to Korea has reached a very grave phase.
					
					 Japan was zealously involved in the monstrous crimes committed by the U.S. imperialists during the past Korean War.
					
					 The Japanese militarist forces with such crime-woven history behind are working hard to stage a comeback to Korea under a war umbrella of the U.S. again in the new century. This is clearly evidenced by the above-mentioned fact.
					
					 Such moves of Japan cannot be construed otherwise than a very grave and serious development. One can observe that Japan's moves to hurl the SDF into the Korean front in "contingency" on the peninsula are a prelude to the Japanese militarist forces' war.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries-loudmouthed "tightened alliance" and "counteraction" to cope with the situation in the vicinity of Japan are, in essence, a call for reinvasion and a slogan of war. 
					
					 If they ignite the second Korean War in league with the U.S. imperialists at any cost, the army and people of the DPRK will give vent to the pent-up hatred for Japan and deal a merciless sledge-hammer blow at the aggressors. 
					
					 The Japanese militarist forces had better not misjudge the warnings of the DPRK.

articles.title: All Koreans Called upon to Hold Higher Banner of Inter-Korean Declarations
articles.content:
All Koreans Called upon to Hold Higher Banner of Inter-Korean Declarations
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- All the Koreans in the north and the south and overseas are called upon to put increased spurs to the grand march for patriotism to achieve national reunification as early as possible, holding higher the banner of the inter-Korean declarations which indicate the way of carving out the independent destiny of the nation, the way of achieving the great unity of the whole nation. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in a signed article.
					
					 Stressing the need to stage actions, regarding the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration as faith in reunification and patriotism, the article goes on:
					
					 How to approach the inter-Korean declarations is a touchstone to draw a line between patriotism and treachery and between reunification and division. Whoever truly stands for national reunification should firmly uphold the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and make a courageous decision to turn out in actions to implement them. 
					
					 The movement for independent reunification should be let rage wherever Koreans live. Brisk joint actions of diverse forms and solidarity movements should be launched by organizations grouping people of various circles and in various fields including workers, farmers, youth and students in the north and the south and all-Korea reunification events should be held to make the joy over reunification sweep throughout the 3,000-ri land of Korea. 
					
					 Pro-reunification patriotic activities for implementing the inter-Korean declarations should be encouraged and strongly supported and all members of the nation should join in these actions. All the political parties, organizations and people from all walks of life in the south should single-mindedly unite in the actions for the independence and democracy of the society and national reunification and thus contribute to accomplishing the June 15 cause.

articles.title: Story of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Story of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- One May day in Juche 53 (1964) President Kim Il Sung had a conversation with agricultural researchers on an experimental field belonging to his residence.   
					 Growing on the field were leaf-heavy plants rare to be seen in the spring season. They were being cultivated experimentally by the President for feed.
					
					 When the President asked them whether they knew the plant, one of them answered it was common burdock.
					
					 The President said that he was right and that during the anti-Japanese armed struggle, the revolutionary fighters ate roots of common burdock, calling it Mt. Paektu broad bellflower. 
					
					 He also said that, planted on the experimental field in spring, they were already leaved out, growing so heavy. He then picked up a plant to weigh it.
					
					 Seeing it weighing 3kg, he said one hectare would produce 100 tons and asked one of the researchers to feed pigs on the plant and check its value.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige fabrica filial del Complejo de Ryongsong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige fabrica filial del Complejo de Ryongsong 
Pyongyang, 1 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la fabrica filial del Complejo de Maquinaria de Ryongsong.
					  El estuvo primero en la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria.
					
					  Senalando que bajo la sabia direccion y minuciosa atencion del Presidente Kim Il Sung, esta fabrica se ha convertido en una base de maquinaria capaz de fabricar cualquier maquina sofisticada deseada, subrayo que se registraran en letras doradas en los anales de la patria la hazana revolucionaria del Presidente de haber construido la autoctona industria de maquinaria.
					
					  Luego de escuchar la explicacion ante el plano de la fabrica, hizo conocimiento en detalles del estado de reconstruccion tecnica y produccion recorriendo varios talleres de produccion.
					
					  Evaluo altamente los meritos de los obreros de la fabrica diciendo que ellos son infinitamente fieles al partido y la revolucion y alcanzaron el gran exito de haber renovado los equipos existentes en los modernos de nivel sofisticado y buen funcionamiento ahorrando fabulosos fondos, al librar una campana para ese fin usando su espiritu revolucionario de autoconfianza.
					
					  Es un gran exito que la clase obrera de la fabrica realizara la modernizacion y la cientifizacion de los procesos productivos con las fuerzas y tecnicas propias en el fragor de la lucha por conquistar las tecnologias de punta, senalo y destaco que este salto brillante deviene la manifestacion del espiritu de lucha de los obreros de Ryongsong y de la inagotable fuerza de la heroica clase obrera coreana que impulsa en la delantera la causa socialista de Corea con el espiritu manifestado durante la Marcha penosa manteniendo firmemente los principios del socialismo y la revolucion en cualesquier vientos y mareas.
					
					  Gracias al fuerte apoyo de muchas poderosas fabricas de maquinaria como el Complejo de Maquinaria de Ryongsong, pudimos realizar con brillantez en un corto tiempo la industrializacion socialista y sentar la solida base de economia nacional independiente, apunto y subrayo que esta asegurada la victoria de la causa de construccion de la gran potencia prospera gracias a la autoctona industria de maquinaria.
					
					  Presento las tareas que se presentan ante la fabrica filial.
					
					  Al ver varios materiales de construccion y articulos de uso diario fabricados por ella usando eficientemente los residuos, senalo que es muy buena la calidad de ellos y elogio el espiritu de servio al pueblo de los obreros de la fabrica quienes se esfuerzan en todo lo posible por mejorar las condiciones de vida del pueblo.
					
					  Recorriendo ese dia las instalaciones de autoabastecimiento incluyendo el comedor de obreros construido nuevamente, atendio con afecto paternal la vida de los obreros.
					
					  Los orgullosos exitos logrados en los ultimos anos por la fabrica se deben a que los funcionarios de ella realizaron de modo cientifico y rentable toda la administracion empresarial incluyendo la produccion, el desarrollo tecnico y la labor de autoabastecimiento, conforme a los principios de administracion economica socialista a nuestro estilo, dijo y enfatizo que es muy importante para la aceleracion de la marcha por el gran auge que los funcionarios organicen cientifica y minuciosamente la gestion economica y el trabajo administrativo.
					
					  Expreso la gran esperanza y conviccion de que la clase obrera de la fabrica registrara incesantes innovaciones y saltos en la delantera del gran auge revolucionario por la construccion de una gran potencia prospera levantando en alto la bandera roja de la revolucion.
					
					  En la ocasion el fue acompanado por Kwak Pom Gi, secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Hamgyong del Sur, Kim Ki Nam y Hong Sok Hyong, miembros del Buro Politico y secretarios del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui, miembro del BP y jefa de departamento del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek, miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del CDN, Pak To Chun y Thae Jong Su, miembros suplentes del BP y secretarios del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige la Universidad de Energia Hidraulica de Hamhung
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige la Universidad de Energia Hidraulica de Hamhung
Pyongyang, 1 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la Universidad de Energia Hidraulica de Hamhung.
					  Guiado por los funcionarios directivos del plantel docente vio la sala de presentacion del historial.
					
					  Esta universidad, fundada y recorrida por un camino lleno de glorias por la iniciativa y la sabia direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung, fue preparada como digno centro de formacion del personal  tecnico, dijo y continuo que las inmortales hazanas revolucionarias del Presidente se exaltaran eternamente en los anales de la patria.
					
					  En el pasado, la Universidad de Energia Hidraulica de Hamhung, base de formacion del talentoso personal de energia  hidraulica, hizo gran aporte a realizar el grandioso proyecto del PTC por la geotransformacion natural incluyendo el Complejo Hidraulico del Mar Oeste de talla mundial, la Central Hidroelectrica Taedonggang, la roturacion de las Marismas Taegyedo, senalo y destaco que nuestro partido y pueblo no olvidaran jamas las proezas de los profesores, empleados y estudiantes de este plantel docente acumuladas ante el partido y la revolucion, la patria y el pueblo.
					
					  El Dirigente recorrio la Exposicion Permanente de los Exitos logrados en la Educacion e Investigacion Cientifica.
					
					  Al recorrer los articulos exhibidos, el Dirigente se entero detalladamente de los exitos alcanzados en el desarrollo  docente y la investigacion cientifica y mostro gran satisfaccion de que los profesores, empleados y estudiantes hayan hecho muchos trabajos para el desarrollo del pais.
					
					  Hizo recorrido por varias salas de leccion y la biblioteca y participo en la leccion de lenguas extranjeras para cerciorarse detalladamente del estado docente.
					
					  Satisfaciendose mucho de que los profesores y empleados del plantel docente hayan registrado un nuevo viraje en la ensenanza y la investigacion cientifica, evaluo altamente sus exitos.
					
					  Se reunio con los pedagogos e investigadores quienes durante largo tiempo hicieron especial aporte a la educacion y la investigacion cientifica y los estimulo cordialmente.
					
					  Evaluo altamente los meritos de los profesores e investigadores incluyendo los Academicos, Profesores y Doctores y se fotografio junto a ellos.
					
					  El Dirigente presento las tareas programaticas que le incumben a la Universidad.
					
					  Los profesores y empleados del plantel deben tener presente siempre del proposito del partido de llevar en un tiempo tan corto las ciencias y tecnicas del pais al nivel de talla mundial y formar mucho a los personales cientificos y tecnicos mejorando y fortaleciendo incesantemente la labor docente conforme a la demanda de la realidad en desarrollo, apunto.
					
					  A fin de formar a los estudiantes como competentes cientificos y tecnicos que demanda la epoca de IT, la universidad debe materializar el espiritu del partido y de clase obrera, establecer firmemente el Juche en la educacion, renovar incesantemente el contenido y calidad de la educacion y en particular, mejorar y fortalecer decisivamente la ensenanza cientifica y tecnica, asevero.
					
					  Subrayo la necesidad de desplegar animadamente las labores para introducir las tecnicas avanzadas bajo la estrecha relacion con los organos de investigacion cientifica y las universidades.
					
					  El Dirigente expreso gran esperanza y conviccion de que todos los profesores, empleados y estudiantes del plantel docente traeran nuevo viraje en la formacion del personal cientifico y tecnico y el desarrollo cientifico y tecnico. 
					
					   En la ocasion el Dirigente fue acompanado por Kwak Pom Gi, secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Hamgyong del Sur, Kim Ki Nam y Hong Sok Hyong, miembros del Buro Politico (BP) y secretarios del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui, miembro del BP y jefa de departamento del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek, miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del CDN, Pak To Chun y Thae Jong Su, miembros suplentes del BP y secretarios del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno fabricas de ciudad de Hamhung
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno fabricas de ciudad de Hamhung
						
 Pyongyang, 1 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dirigio sobre el terreno varias fabricas de industria ligera de la ciudad de Hamhung.
					  Estuvo primero en el Combinado de Alimentos de Paekunsan.
					
					  Luego de escuchar el historial de la fabrica, se entero detalladamente del estado de la reconstruccion, los equipos tecnicos y la produccion recorriendo los procesos de produccion de fideos, de confite, de pan y otros.
					
					  Al conocer minuciosamente tambien el estado de produccion de los alimentos especiales de distintos generos, el Dirigente expreso su alegria de que se pudiera suministrar mucho los alimentos sabrosos y nutritivos a los habitantes. 
					
					  La chispa encendida en el ano pasado por el partido en la Fabrica de Productos Especiales Samilpho se ha extendido a lo largo del pais, con lo cual se construyeron en todas las provincias uno tras otro los combinados de alimentos, senalo y subrayo que esto prueba que cuando los funcionarios luchan energicamente superando las dificultades y pruebas con el espiritu de servicio abnegado al pueblo, es posible dar mucho beneficio a los habitantes aun en las actuales condiciones dificiles.
					
					  El Dirigente presento las tareas que serviran de guia en la administracion de la fabrica y expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los empleados del combinado, con el espiritu de amor al pueblo, produciran mucho los alimentos que contribuiran al mejoramiento de la vida alimentaria de los habitantes.
					
					  Acto seguido, dirigio en el terreno la Fabrica de Articulos Plasticos de Uso Diario de Ex Militares Minusvalidos de Hamhung.
					
					  Recorrio varios procesos de produccion e hizo conocimiento detallado del estado de la produccion viendo los articulos de distintos generos de la fabrica.
					
					  Evaluo altamente los trabajos de los ex militares heridos y sus familiares de la fabrica satisfaciendose mucho de que ellos produjeran en gran cantidad varios articulos que contribuyen a la mejora de la vida del pueblo con aquel espiritu e impetu de los dias de servicio militar en el frente en pleno acato a la instruccion del Presidente de que la flor debe florecer de continuo.  
					
					Particularmente, las sandalias cristalinas moldeadas por inyeccion, que se producen en esta fabrica, son hermosos tanto en sus formas como en colores y tambien confortables a ponerse, dijo y anadio que esto es un fruto valioso de ardiente carino por el pueblo que se palpa fuertemente en el alma de los ex militares heridos.
					
					Puntualizo que las organizaciones del partido a todos niveles deben prestar siempre profunda atencion a la labor y la vida de los ex militares minusvalidos senalando que estos, quienes habian luchado dedicando su juventud y vida por el partido y el lider, por la patria y el pueblo, son los hombres que debemos atender al maximo.
					
					El Dirigente presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia en la gestion de la fabrica.
					
					Por ultimo, el Dirigente se entero del estado de la construccion de la Fabrica Farmaceutica de Hungnam.
					
					Tras escuchar las explicaciones ante la maqueta de la fabrica, el hizo conocimiento detallado sobre las variedades y eficacias de varios medicamentos producidos en la fabrica. 
					
					Expreso su gran satisfaccion de que la clase obrera de esta fabrica haya terminado principalmente la obra del edificio de produccion y hace ingentes esfuerzos por instalar los modernos equipos farmaceuticos.
					
					Evaluo altamente los meritos de los obreros de la fabrica destacando que es un gran exito el que la fabrica haya impulsado con vigor la magna obra de construccion y aumentado al mismo tiempo en 3 veces la produccion de medicinas en comparacion con la anterior.
					
					El Dirigente presento las tareas que se presentan en terminar con anticipacion la construccion de la fabrica y aumentar la produccion de medicamentos.
					
					Y manifesto su esperanza y conviccion de que los funcionarios, obreros y tecnicos de la fabrica terminaran cuanto antes la construccion y registraran nuevo salto e innovacion en la produccion de medicamentos.
					
					En esta ocasion el Dirigente fue acompanado por Kwak Pom Gi, secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Hamgyong del Sur, Kim Ki Nam y Hong Sok Hyong, miembros del Buro Politico y secretarios del Comite Central del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui, miembro del BP y jefa de departamento del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek, miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del CDN, Pak To Chun y Thae Jong Su, miembros suplentes del BP y secretarios del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunto Kim Su Jo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunto Kim Su Jo 
Pyongyang, 1 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il envio este miercoles una ofrenda floral ante el feretro del difunto Kim Su Jo, laureado con el Premio Kim Il Sung, Heroe de la Republica, artista del Pueblo, diputado a la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y director del Conjunto Operistico Mar de Sangre, en senal de profundas condolencias por su fallecimiento.

articles.title: Preparados en Corea nuevos medicamentos veterinarios
articles.content:
Preparados en Corea nuevos medicamentos veterinarios
Pyongyang, 1 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Recientemente, fueron preparados en Corea nuevos y eficaces medicamentos veterinarios, incluyendo la parasiticida integral hecha en el Parque Zoologico Nacional.
					Este medicamento elaborado agregando el cobre en Bithionol surte maravillosos efectos reaccionando contra todos los parasitos en los intestinos de animales como trematodos, tenias y nematelmintos.
					
					Su tasa de exterminacion de parasitos llega a 95 ~ 100 por ciento.
					
					Ha sido evaluado altamente en la reciente XI exposicion nacional de invenciones y nuevas tecnicas.
					
					Por otra parte, el centro de prevencion veterinaria de la Direccion de Avicultura de Pyongyang invento la nueva vacuna contra una epidemia que se expande mucho entre los pollitos de 3 o 6 semanas de nacimiento marcando alto porcentaje de mortalidad.
					
					Esta vacuna muy antigena, hecha al extraer un nuevo virus reproductor, esta en boga en las entidades usuarias.
